biocode.fims.bcid

Class ProjectMinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • biocode.fims.bcid.ProjectMinter

  • public class ProjectMinter
extends java.lang.Object
    Mint new expeditions. Includes the automatic creation of a core set of entity types

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProjectMinter()
      The constructor defines the class-level variables used when minting Expeditions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectMinter

        public ProjectMinter()
        The constructor defines the class-level variables used when minting Expeditions. It defines a generic set of entities (process, information content, objects, agents) that can be used for any expedition.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
